Your digital one-stop solution for genetics

Genetics can be a complicated affair. Elsie is a one-stop solution that delivers an innovative and convenient approach to streamline how genetics works.

Genetics for everyone

Elsie is a digital health platform that works closely with with healthcare units, labs and physicians. Together, we are building a worldwide network around genetically informed medicine.

Elsie Approach

Privacy and Security

Data privacy and security is our number one priority. We pledge to uphold the highest standards of bioethics and procedures to keep healthcare units, laboratories, physicians and patients data safe and secure.

Backed by Science

All genomics knowledge available in Elsie is backed by high quality scientific evidence and continuously reviewed by our expert medical and genetics team.

Forward Thinking

We'll make sure Elsie keeps up with the latest groundbreaking discoveries in genetics world, and our team deliver these to you as quicly as possible. Be on cutting edge with Elsie.

Take the next step

Schedule a demo to see Elsie in action or leave your email and we'll be in touch.
